1.title: Saucy New England BBQ
1.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are at The Federal, a brand new steakhouse in Waltham. Plus some great BBQ around New England. Bonetown in RI, Shane's Texas Pit in NH, Bobby and Jack's in Tewksbury, and more.

2.title: Next Level Comfort Food
2.plot: From decadent Kobe Burgers at The Fix in Worcester to addictive Reuben Nuggets at Idle Hour in Quincy, we're taking comfort food to the next level. Plus can Mike survive the Helltini at Rockafellas?

3.title: Eating Around the Clock
3.plot: Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and late night. We have something delicious for everyone, no matter what time of day you like to eat.

4.title: Bigger is Better
4.plot: Size matters. From giant cheesesteaks in Rhode Island to overstuffed burritos in Haverhill, and some of the most delicious comfort food around in Worcester, we're loading you up with the good stuff.

1.title: Six Pound BBQ Challenge
1.plot: Leigh & Leila go head-to-head at F1 Boston... and Mike attempts the 6lb Feed Bag Challenge at KC'S Rib Shack.

2.title: Tresca with Ray Bourque
2.plot: Boston Bruins legend & NHL Hall of Famer, Ray Bourque gives Leila a tour of his beautiful North End restaurant - Tresca.

3.title: Fred & Steve's Steakhouse
3.plot: We head to Fred & Steve's Steakhouse for an exclusive interview, along with Demeters Steakhouse and Kanes Donuts.

4.title: Scrooge and the Ice Bar
4.plot: Pat chats with David Coffee (Scrooge) at North Shore Music Theatre before he performs in A Christmas Carol, plus Mike & Leigh visit Frost Ice Bar in Boston.

5.title: Tailgating with Rob Gronkowski's Family
5.plot: The Wicked Bites crew heads out to Gillette Stadium for some tailgating before a New England Patriots game, including a stop at the Gronkowski Family tailgate.

6.title: Celebrity Gaming Challenge
6.plot: Will Middlebrooks (Boston Red Sox), Ryan Mallett (New England Patriots) and John "Doomsday" Howard (UFC) take part in the Celebrity Gaming Challenge. Mike & Leigh take you to The Pour House in Boston.

7.title: Coliseum to the Cage
7.plot: Brittany takes us to the Coliseum to the Cage MMA fights and Sarah shows off the Boston Red Sox 2013 World Series trophy.

8.title: Brewing Beer & Making Pizza
8.plot: Mike is learning how to brew beer, while Leigh is cooking up a pizza and calzone.

9.title: The Taco Eating Challenge
9.plot: Mike and Brittany call the play-by-play action of the Taco Eating Challenge at Playmakers.

10.title: Manchester Monarchs and the Holy Grail
10.plot: Leigh and Sarah hit the ice with the Manchester Monarchs.

11.title: The 11th Annual Flutie Bowl
11.plot: Leila and Doug Flutie bowl a few frames at the 11th Annual Flutie Bowl.

12.title: Boston Bruins Casino Night
12.plot: Brittany chats with the entire Bruins team at their 2014 Boston Bruins Casino Night.

13.title: Ride the Bull
13.plot: Mike & Brittany spend a night riding a mechanical bull, while Pat is attending Filippo Frattaroli's 60th Birthday at his restaurant in the North End.

14.title: Dinner & a Movie
14.plot: This week is the Wicked Bites - Oscars Special. The crew gives their picks for the 2014 Academy Awards. Mike is checking out a "Lux Level" movie theater, while Kayla takes us to a Daytona 500 party, and Leila gets tropical.

15.title: Mike Meets Hell's Kitchen
15.plot: Mike is in the kitchen at Abby Lane, Boston, with Chef Jason Santos (Hell's Kitchen) cooking up some amazing food. Also, Mike & Scott are going head-to-head over the Best Nachos.

16.title: Happy St. Patrick's Day
16.plot: The Wicked Bites crew celebrates St. Paddy's Day by taking you to some of their favorite Irish Pubs... and 2014 Team USA Paralympic Sled Hockey Gold Medalist, Taylor Chace joins us.

17.title: Extreme Beer Fest & MMA Training
17.plot: Mike & Scott check out what's on tap at Extreme Beer Fest 2014. Brittany climbs into the cage for some MMA training with UFC fighter, John "Doomsday" Howard.

18.title: Wicked Bites Goes Old Hollywood
18.plot: Leigh takes in the "Old Hollywood" style at Cuchi Cuchi, while Brittany is checking out a Cook Off between two New England Patriots.

19.title: Boston Strong
19.plot: Wicked Bites visit various restaurants and bars along the 26.2 mile route of the 2014 Boston Marathon.

20.title: Hotter Than Hell
20.plot: Brittany is at Hotter Than Hell Night. Leigh finds a giant burger. And Kayla goes under the sea for a dumpling cook-off.

21.title: Cinco de Mayo!
21.plot: It's a Cinco de Mayo celebration on Wicked Bites. We take you to some of our favorite Mexican restaurants.

22.title: Pitching in for Kids with the Boston Red Sox
22.plot: Brittany reports from the charity event "Pitching In For Kids" with players from the Boston Red Sox.

23.title: Pizza, Steak Tips & BBQ! Oh My!
23.plot: Mike has a feast at Blackstrap BBQ in Winthrop, MA. Scott tries the New Bridge Cafe's famous steak tips, Sarah checks out a spot with 900 degree pizza, and Leila finds a newly opened restaurant.

24.title: Burgers, Patios & Pools! Summer's Begun!
24.plot: Mike's sampling 7 very unique burgers. Leila shows us some great food out on a patio, overlooking the water and we introduce the newest member of the Wicked Bites Crew, McKenzie.

25.title: The 6th Annual Applewood BBQ Smoke-Off
25.plot: Mike, Scott & Brittany spend the night with some competitive BBQ cooks at The 6th Annual Applewood BBQ Smoke-Off.

26.title: Foxwoods
26.plot: The Wicked Bites crew spends a weekend enjoying all the fun & luxury that Foxwoods Resort Casino has to offer. Special Guest: Joe Gannascoli (Vito from The Sopranos)

27.title: Summertime in Boston
27.plot: Mike's taking advantage of the beautiful summer weather in Boston, as he checks out the outside dining at NEBO and chats with owners, Christine and Carla Pallotta.

28.title: 1st Annual Salem Willows Lobster Roll Eating Competition
28.plot: Mike, along with Andrew DePaola of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, has been entered in the 1st Annual Lobster Roll Eating Competition at the Salem Willows Seafood Festival.

29.title: Take Me Out to the Ball Game
29.plot: Leigh & Mike take in a Lowell Spinners game, Brittany sits down for a chat with Maria Menounos, and Kayla is at a toga party at a penthouse rooftop overlooking Boston.

30.title: 95th Annual Feast of Saint Anthony
30.plot: Mike & Scott are in the North End of Boston taking in all sights, sounds, excitement... and great food of Saint Anthony's Feast!

31.title: Mayo Bowl 2014 with the New England Patriots
31.plot: Leila is in Brookline showing us how to make shawarma... McKenzie hits the lanes with the New England Patriots at the 2014 Mayo Bowl... Scott returns to Tina's kitchen... and Mike is grabbing some craft beers & comfort food!

32.title: Hampton Beach Seafood Festival
32.plot: Mike & Scott are bringing you all the action from the Hampton Beach Seafood Festival, including the big Lobster Roll Eating Competition!

33.title: Who Ya Gonna Call?!?
33.plot: Mike is with, iconic actor, Dan Aykroyd... they're talking about some of Dan's favorite Boston restaurants, Crystal Head Vodka, Ghostbusters 3 & so much more!

34.title: Sylvania 300
34.plot: Mike is at the New Hampshire Motor Speedway bringing you all the excitement from the NASCAR Sylvania 300, including an exclusive 1-on-1 interview with Danica Patrick!

35.title: Burgers & Beers as Far as the Eye Can See
35.plot: Mike travels to Providence, RI to check out a "burger bar" with over a dozen different variations on sliders! Plus, Scott and Leigh are showing you a couple Italian restaurants in & around Boston!

1.title: Comics Come Home XX
1.plot: Scott introduces us to a place taking an extreme twist on pizza & burgers, Easy Pie! The crew is at the 20th Anniversary of Comics Come Home, with some of the best comedians joining Denis Leary for a great cause! Mike chats with Cam Neely about the event and so much more!

2.title: It's Donut Day!
2.plot: It's Donut Day on Wicked Bites. Mike shows you the "best mac and cheese" he's ever had - and Leigh introduces us to a very unique spot in Providence, RI.

3.title: Captain America
3.plot: Mike sits down with Chris Evans (Captain America) and tries to get some inside info out of him on Avengers: Age of Ultron! Scott is discussing the state of the Red Sox with their manager John Farrell... and McKenzie & Leigh give your sweet tooth it's fix!

4.title: What's Your Favorite Pizza?
4.plot: Mike's checking out a tavern with historic roots, while Leigh is trying to get a secret steak tip recipe from an ex-boxer.

5.title: 2015 Rhode Island Beer Fest
5.plot: Mike and Scott are getting into trouble at another beer fest, this time in Rhode Island.

6.title: Comfort Food & Florida Restaurants
6.plot: Mike spent the weekend eating and drinking his way through Delray Beach, Florida. We also check out some great spots for comfort foods like mac-n-cheese, hot dogs, fried chicken, and Chinese food buffets!

7.title: The Burger Show
7.plot: We're doing all burgers this week! Big burgers, specialty burgers, challenge burgers, a burger car, and more!

8.title: Comfort Food & Iron Chefs
8.plot: While Scott is judging an Iron Chef competition, Mike takes us out for some one-of-a-kind grilled cheese sandwiches. And Leigh and Leila show us the finer sides of comfort food.

9.title: The Diner Show
9.plot: This week we take you to some of the best, most unique and historic diners in all of New England!

10.title: Something for All Tastes
10.plot: This week on Wicked Bites no matter what your craving is, we have something for you! Leigh's at a Award Winning, Chinese restaurant... Scott's found a place that does HUGE portions of seafood... Leigh Anne has discovered the largest pizza in the city... and Mike takes us out for some of the best BBQ you'll ever have!

11.title: New England Patriots Cook-Off!
11.plot: Mike and Scott are hosting a Cooking Competition between two New England Patriots! Leila takes us to one of the best steakhouses in the North Shore, Mike has found a 2x Burger Battle Champion, and Scott introduces us to Korean Chicken Wings!

12.title: Wicked Bites Is Going Cruising!
12.plot: Mike, Leigh, Scott and Leila set sail on the Norwegian Dawn Cruise Ship... and they're taking you through all the ins & outs of the cruise's amenities! Also on this episode, we have found the best steak tips ever!

13.title: The Wicked Bites Sandwich & Boston Red Sox
13.plot: Mike & Leigh are having some fun with the Boston Red Sox at the 2015 Pitching in for Kids event! Brittany & Roxy take us to Pauli's in the North End, and make the Wicked Bites Sandwich! Leila is at Tempo in Waltham trying one of the best pork chops ever, and Scott heads out to Worcester for Coney Island Hot Dogs!

14.title: Big Ol' Mess of BBQ & the Widowmaker
14.plot: This week Mike & Brittany are serving up some huge portions of BBQ on Wicked Bites! Taylor is taking on The Widowmaker Burger and Leigh is in the kitchen, cooking up some authentic Mexican dishes!

15.title: Summer in New England
15.plot: The crew is all over New England this week, bringing you some of the best spots for summertime bites!

16.title: Viewers' Choice Vol. 1
16.plot: This week on Wicked Bites is Part 1 of our two-part Viewers' Choice Specials! You picked them, we're showing them! We're bringing you these special episodes from the BOKX Pool & BOKX 109 American Prime in Newton, MA.

17.title: Viewers' Choice Vol. 2
17.plot: This week is the conclusion of our two-part Viewers' Choice Specials! You picked them, we're showing them! Including a trip to the race track with Danica Patrick! We're presenting these special episodes from the BOKX Pool & BOKX 109 American Prime in Newton, MA.

18.title: It's All Fun and Games When Wicked Bites Shows Up
18.plot: Mike, Leigh & Scott take over the new Dave & Buster's this week on Wicked Bites! We also head to Newport for some great Mexican and introduce you to a brand new sushi bar in the North End of Boston!

19.title: Ghost Hunting with Wicked Bites
19.plot: The crew is looking for ghosts at the Colonial Inn, which supposedly has a "haunted room"... plus we take you to the oldest tavern in America!

20.title: Down on the Farm
20.plot: Mike, Leigh & Scott are getting into the Fall season! Apple picking, corn fields, hay rides, pumpkin flavored EVERYTHING! Mike also stops by Al's Deli to try the "secret sandwich" know as The HUSH.

21.title: The Circus Is in Town
21.plot: The Circus is pulling into town and the gang is getting in on the act! Plus Mike is in Laconia, NH checking out a historic vacation destination with a very cool beach-front bar! Leigh is in the kitchen with an Award Winning Chef at one of the best Italian restaurants you'll find outside Boston's North End!

22.title: The Pizza Show
22.plot: We're doing all pizza - all day on this episode of Wicked Bites! We travel to Hampton, NH, Newburyport, MA, the North End of Boston... and of course, Regina Pizzeria in Allston for some of the best pizza you'll ever have!

23.title: Beer... Beer... And More Beer!
23.plot: We are all about the beer on this week's Wicked Bites! Leigh brews her own beer at Hopsters... Mike is washing down some award winning chili with a local brew... and Scott tosses a few back while playing a few rounds of indoor golf!

24.title: Some of the Finer Tastes
24.plot: This week the Wicked Bites crew is dining out in style! Leigh is with Chef Cris Coombs at his outstanding steakhouse, Boston Chops... Scott has found one of the finest French bistros in all of the Merrimack Valley... and Mike has found a place that stocks over 100 of the best scotch, bourbons & whiskeys around! Plus we visit the Yebba family at the original Teresa's for some amazing Italian dishes!

25.title: Wicked Bites 1st Annual Christmas Special
25.plot: Mike, Leigh & Scott head to Sunday River for some skiing and holiday shenanigans, as they look back on some memorable moments from 2015!

1.title: Salute to Summer
1.plot: While hitting the snowy slopes at Sunday River, the Wicked Bites crew looks back at some of the more sunny, tropical times on the show... it's a Salute to Summer!

2.title: Sunday River
2.plot: Mike, Leigh & Scott are at Sunday River for some fun in the snow! Skiing, eating, drinking and experiencing everything this great ski resort has to offer!

3.title: UFC Fight Night - Boston
3.plot: Mike sits down with local UFC Fighter - Charles Rosa, who is also a accomplished Chef in Del Rey Beach, FL! Leigh learns how to cook Hibachi style... and Mike finds a cool bar with a great beer selection and one-of-a-kind mac-n-cheese dishes!

4.title: Cheap Eats & Hidden Gems
4.plot: This week we seek out some cheap eats, off the beaten path! Mike heads to the South Shore for some delicious, stacked-high burgers! Leigh has discovered a great spot for lunch inside a South End furniture store! And Scott is digging into some amazing sandwiches at Fuse Bistro!

5.title: A Little Bit of Everything
5.plot: We have something for everyone this week! Leigh is cutting meat at a butcher shop, Mike has found a great Mexican restaurant on the South Shore, Scott discovers "fried dough pizza" and we stop into Lobster Q for some food, drinks & fun!

6.title: 1st Annual Bourbon & Bacon Fest
6.plot: We're going ALL bacon and ALL bourbon on this week's Wicked Bites! Mike, Leigh & Scott are at the 1st Annual Bourbon & Bacon Fest in Boston... and we stop into some great spots for unique bacon dishes and amazing selections of bourbon!

7.title: Let's Get a Little Loco!
7.plot: Mike attempts a monster-sized burger challenge in Salem, Leigh has a great spot for German food on the North Shore, and Scott hits a classic diner in Lowell... plus tacos, margaritas & oysters at a hot bar in South Boston!

8.title: 2016 Best Pizza in New England Contest
8.plot: Cara Donna is having their annual contest to determine the Best Pizza Shop in New England, and Gillette Stadium is hosting the Final Round! We visit the Top 3 Pizza Shops and chat with some Patriots & Red Sox legends!

9.title: From Dive Bars to Five Stars
9.plot: Mike takes us to the 4-time winner of Best Sports Bar on the North Shore, Leigh is working her sweet tooth with a new twist on cupcakes, Scott is getting a taste of some of the best Greek food around... plus we visit Eddie Aprile and his stunning restaurant for some great food, drinks & a whole lot of fun!

10.title: We Made Our Own Beer
10.plot: We've found a great bakery for custom desserts, a brand new steakhouse that throws it back to the days of Prohibition, some great seafood and HUGE lobsters...plus we're making up a batch of Wicked Bites Beer!

11.title: Let's Hit the Bars
11.plot: We're hitting all kinds of bars this week! From a knickknack covered tavern with five-star food, to a family owned pub with a menu as big as their personalities! And even a great raw bar!

12.title: Summertime Food, Drinks & Views
12.plot: It's summertime in New England! That means Wicked Bites is taking you out to some of the best spots for dining on the water... and when you dine on the water in the summer, it has to be lobster rolls, raw bar and tasty tropical drinks!

13.title: Comfort Food with a View
13.plot: Summertime in New England isn't just for seafood... this week on Wicked Bites we have your comfort food hook up!

14.title: From Waterfront to Wine Cellar Dining
14.plot: We have a little bit of everything this week. Farm-to-table cooking in Kendall Square, family recipes in the North End, a seasonal Shanty that can do anything with a lobster & more!

15.title: Cuban Dinner with Luis Tiant
15.plot: This week we take to a world famous diner, a very cool scratch kitchen, a seafood restaurant right on the water... and we're having a Cuban Rum & Cigar Dinner with Boston Red Sox legend - Luis Tiant!

16.title: Stogie Heaven
16.plot: This week we're checking out a fantastic steakhouse, world famous Chinese ribs, authentic Irish cuisine, an award-winning sports bar, plus Mike & Scott head to New Hampshire for some great cigars!

17.title: A Taste of Italy
17.plot: Mike, Scott & Melissa are dining on fantastic Italian food in Winchester. Leigh is searching for great, authentic BBQ in Waltham. And Brittany is getting into the Halloween spirit in Abington. All this and more on this week's Wicked Bites!

18.title: Boston to Bermuda
18.plot: Wicked Bites has set sail for Bermuda for a whole week on board the newly renovated Norwegian Dawn! Eating, drinking, partying for seven days at sea!

19.title: A Little Bit Sushi... A Little Bit Rock-n-Roll
19.plot: We've found an Olympic runner, turned chef that makes amazing Caribbean food! Plus some authentic southern hospitality in Somerville... and Mike, Scott & Melissa hit up Hojoko in The Verb Hotel for a spicy game of Sushi Roulette!

20.title: Burgers, Meat Pies & Tap N Vine!
20.plot: We diving head-first into a brand new restaurant on the North Shore, called Tap n Vine! Mike is at R.F. O'Sullivan's trying some of their award winning burgers, while Scott heads to Methuen for authentic European Meat Pies!

21.title: Marcus Smart's Celebrity Bowling Tournament
21.plot: This week we're bowling with some of the Boston Celtics... Mike found an amazing restaurant in the "Backroom" of a deli... Scott is learning how to make European Meat Pies... and Brittany takes us for a festive train ride.

22.title: Bacon... Bacon... And Even More Bacon!
22.plot: We're getting our fill of bacon this week at The Hangover Pub! Plus Mike has found a spot for fantastic Southern Fare... and Scott's at a Caribbean restaurant with a chef that's also an Olympic runner!

1.title: Salute to Summer 2
1.plot: Water front dining, tropical drinks, fresh seafood and more. We take a look back at some of our favorite moments from summer while cruising to Bermuda on Norwegian Dawn. It's another Wicked Bites Salute to Summer.

2.title: Historic New England Diners
2.plot: We're taking a look at some of the most historic diners in New England. Mike's making a Triple Murder Burger at Haven Bros. in Providence. And Leigh is working your sweet tooth with the Boston Cream Pancakes at South St. Diner. Whether you're looking for breakfast, lunch, dinner or late night eats - we have you covered.

3.title: From Fashion to the Farm
3.plot: Mike, Scott and Leigh are filling up on roast beef at The Beef Barn. Plus Mike is at a new hot spot on Moody St. in Waltham - Red Bird. Melissa is cooking up some great Italian dishes in Ipswitch. While Scott is having a blast in Worcester with the Egg Roll Lady.

4.title: The Password Is - Speakeasy
4.plot: Mike, Scott and Leigh find a hidden bar in NH. Plus Melissa is filling up at Slice in Wakefield. Scott accepts Frankenstein Burger Challenge. And Mike's cutting steaks at Alpine Butcher in Lowell.

5.title: Size Matters
5.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are indulging on a 3lb baked stuffed lobster, GIANT King Cut Prime Rib, the delicious "Mike-tini" and more at The Phoenician. Plus Flying Rhino, Ferry St. and Victoria's Diner.

6.title: My Oh Mai Tai
6.plot: Mike, Leigh and Scott are at China Blossom in N. Andover for their famous Mai Tai and unbelievable all-you-can-eat buffet, that includes prime rib and sushi. Plus Massimino's, Lobster Shanty and more.

7.title: Feast with 45
7.plot: Pedro Martinez and forty-five of the top chefs in New England take over Fenway Park. Plus Leigh's cooking at Deano's Pasta in Somerville. And Mike steps up to a burger challenge you will not believe.

8.title: BBQ, Burgers & Beach Views
8.plot: Scott, Leigh and Mike are taking a culinary trip to Italy - via Tremezzo in Wilmington. Plus Moonshine 152 in South Boston, 2 Jerks BBQ in Raynham, and a waterfront clam shack in Connecticut.

9.title: Fun in the Sun
9.plot: Scott, Leigh and Mike hit the links at the Atkinson Country Club. Andrea is at Frates Drive-In for one-of-a-kind burgers and fantastic seafood. Plus the BeerAdvocate Microbrew Invitational and more.

10.title: Waterfront Dining
10.plot: We're taking a look at some fantastic spots for Waterfront Dining. Scott, Mike and Leigh are at Captain Fishbone's in Marina Bay. Melissa is in Gloucester at Capt. Carlo's. Plus Surfside Smokehouse, Tides in Nahant and more.

11.title: Lobster in the Rough
11.plot: What's says, "Summer in New England" more than eating lobsters by the water? Scott, Mike and Leigh are at Chauncey Creek in Maine. While Brittany hits the water to catch her own lobsters. Plus Abbott's in Connecticut and Yankee Lobster Co. in Boston.

12.title: Hyannis Harbor
12.plot: We're exploring all the fun and food in Hyannis Harbor. Scott, Mike and Leigh check out Black Cat Tavern, as well as their fish shack and raw bar. Plus Andrea and Bianca are partying at Trader Ed's.

13.title: Fried Clam Highway
13.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are on a tour of the famous Fried Clam Highway from Ipswich through Essex. They stop by Clam Box, Woodman's, J.T. Farnham's and Village. Plus Kim and VB from WRKO join in the fun.

14.title: Trucks, Trains & Oysters
14.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are at a brand new spot in East Boston - Cunard Tavern. Melissa's having all kinds of fun at a Food Truck Festival in Worcester. Plus Brine Oysters in Newburyport, the Cape Cod Dinner Train and more.

15.title: Wicked Bites Cookout
15.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh have gathered together some food loving friends from Lobster Q in Hampstead, NH and Lazy Dog in Lynn for a backyard cookout, Wicked Bites style. Plus Four Winds Pub and more.

16.title: 2nd Annual Wicked Bites Christmas Special
16.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are getting into the holiday spirit with delicious food, festive drinks and a whole lot of fun. From the historic Hawthorne Hotel to the Gingerbread Construction Co. Plus a five-star resort in New Hampshire and more.

1.title: Comfort Food
1.plot: Scott, Mike and Andrea are at Union St. Restaurant with three floors of food, drinks and fun. Melissa takes us to Fred's Franks in Wakefield and we head to KKatie's Burger Bar for a whole menu of fun. Plus The Barley House and so much more.

2.title: Our 100th Episode!
2.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are celebrating the 100th episode of Wicked Bites at The Establishment in Chelmsford. They also join some of their famous friends at their restaurants. They catch up with Guy Fieri at Foxwoods, Jason Santos at Buttermilk and Bourbon, Taniya Nayak at Yellow Door Taqueria and so much more.

3.title: 3rd Annual Salute to Summer
3.plot: Beach front dining, tropical drinks, fresh seafood and more. We take a look back at some of our favorite moments from summer while enjoying some wintry fun at the Mountain View Grand Resort and Spa. It's another Wicked Bites Salute to Summer.

4.title: Huge Portions of Fun
4.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are at British Beer Company's Annual Game Dinner, at their Sandwich, MA location. Plus HUGE portions of deliciousness at Tilt'n Diner in New Hampshire. And we're sampling some of the 100-Plus tequilas available at Dos Lobos in North Reading, MA.

5.title: The 3rd Annual Diner Show
5.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are enjoying stacks of pancakes, delicious burgers, root beer floats and more at Dave's Diner. Bianca heads to the Roundabout Diner. Mike is at The Diner in Watertown for their famous Reuben Sandwich. Plus Scot is at the historic Agawam Diner and so much more.

6.title: Hot Dog Crazy
6.plot: This week we're going hot dog crazy. Scott, Mike and Melissa are at Lincoln in South Boston for Wiener Wednesdays. Plus we get dogs at Gilley's in Portsmouth, The Dogfather in Worcester, and so much more.

7.title: Shockingly Huge Portions
7.plot: Scott, Mike and Leigh are at KC's Rib Shack for award-winning BBQ by the shovel-full. Plus the largest patio in Worcester at Vintage Grille, the hottest wings in the North End, a 6 foot sub at Bob's in Medford and more.

8.title: Hidden Gems
8.plot: The crew have searched far and wide for these true hidden gems. We've found a five-star steakhouse hidden behind a bar, incredible Italian food down a secret alley, the best breakfast sandwiches around and more.

9.title: Lobster Rolls
9.plot: It's officially Lobster Roll Season in New England. Scott and Mike are joined by Bianca and Roxy to take you from Portland, Maine to Cape Cod and all points in between for some of the biggest and best lobster rolls around.

10.title: Waterfront Dining from Maine to Cape Cod
10.plot: From mudslides on the Cape to baked stuffed lobsters in Maine, Scott and Mike are joined by Melissa and Bianca for some of the most beautiful waterfront views in all of New England.

11.title: Clambakes and Tropical Drinks
11.plot: Scott, Mike and Bianca are taking a galactic, culinary trip to Bella Luna and The Milky Way. Plus we have a clambake at North Shore Lobsters, and head over to Martha's Vineyard for some cocktails.

12.title: Slow Smokin' BBQ
12.plot: Scott, Mike and Bianca are visiting "The Pit Boss" Andy Husbands at his newest Smoke Shop BBQ location in Assembly Row. Plus we head to Durk's Bar-B-Q in Providence, Willie Jewell's in Nashua and more.

13.title: From Holy Donuts to Rock-n-Roll Chicken Wings
13.plot: From Holy Donuts in Maine to Rock-n-Roll Chicken Wings at Boneheads, our mission is to get you hungry. Scott and Mike are joined by Bianca and Nicole on this foodie adventure. Plus Hayseed at Smuttynose Brewery and more.

imdb.title: Wicked Bites
plot: Capturing the unique bond between New England sports and food.::New England Sports Network (NESN)
